/vpcs/{uuid}/start¶

Contents

  • /vpcs/{uuid}/start
    • POST /vpcs/{uuid}/start

      • Response status codes

POST /vpcs/{uuid}/start¶

Start a VPCS instance

Parameters¶

  • uuid: Instance UUID

Response status codes¶

  • 400: Invalid VPCS instance UUID
  • 404: Instance doesn’t exist
  • 204: Instance started
